articles.title: Ukraine's EU hopes get shot in the arm as bloc's leaders approve candidate status - CNN
articles.description: Ukraine's long-term goal of joining the European Union has received its latest shot in the arm, after the bloc's 27 member states agreed Thursday that the country should be given candidate status -- a significant step on the path to full membership.
